```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```

## Let's simulate something

I have this function ... 

```{r}
sim_mean_sd = function(samp_size, mu = 3, sigma = 4) {
  
  sim_data = 
    tibble(
      x = rnorm(n = samp_size, mean = mu, sd = sigma)
    )

  sim_data %>% 
   summarize(
      mean = mean(x),
      sd = sd(x)
    )
}
```

... and I can "simulate" by running this line.

```{r}
sim_mean_sd(30)
```
